ygData.subject: Re: ___JBoots___
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Absolutely not true.  First of all, I think you mean the Troll Shadowknight in Befallen, which has the BBC.  He spawns past some spikes on the 3rd floor of
ygData.messageBody:
>I have heard otherwise about anti camp code. The Ogre
>Shadowknight is supposedly anti camp, it you are in
>front of the spikes, he won't show.

Absolutely not true. First of all, I think you mean the Troll Shadowknight
in Befallen, which has the BBC. He spawns past some spikes on the 3rd
floor of befallen. If you mean the Ogre, it's still not true. I've had
the TSK spawn right next to me, with the BBC in hand, at least 3 times.
I've had the Ogre SK spawn on top of my head and drop the barbed armplates.

So there is definitely no anticamp in Befallen.

Sandeep
